resources.string: Let\'s get you started on exchanging your AFIT for STEEM upvotes!
Step 1 / 3: You need to set up your funds password
Step 2 / 3: Your funds password needs to be verified

Please send at least 1 STEEM/SBD to @actifit.exchange (one time fee)
to verify your funds password & activate your exchange service using form below.
DO NOT CLOSE this window till verification is complete.
Step 3 / 3: You are ready to exchange AFIT for STEEM Upvotes!
Upvotes take place on your next actifit post/report with proof of activity.
